Profile

An experienced customer service professional with the technical skills required to provide excellent support for an established Internet company.

Work Experience


Retail Supervisor Bradford Greenhouses LTD, Bradford, ON

  • Supervise 10+ seasonal employees in the nursery department of a garden centre.
  • Key landscape design professional assisting customers with design and installation based on their requirements
  • Purchasing and merchandising of soils and aggregates resulting in significant sales increases for the 2015 season.
Accomplishments

Since being placed in charge of purchasing and merchandising of soils and aggregates this season sales have almost doubled over last year. I attribute this to designing the layout of the department based on patterns of the customers and redesigning the signage to better inform the customer of the specific uses of each product.

(2014-Present)

IT Administrator Bradford Greenhouses LTD, Barrie, ON

  • Provide hardware, software, and mobile support for 55 users across three physical locations in two cities.
  • Support and maintain point-of-sales hardware and software as well as the Windows Server domain environment.
  • Deploy and perform maintenance on workstations for employees as well as terminals for point-of-sale.
Accomplishments

I was tasked with finding a more cost effective way for the company to host email without loss in functionality. For the size of the company and the amount of users we decided to use Google Apps for Business. I lead the migration from Microsoft Exchange to Google Apps which included transferring all of our users' contacts, archived emails, and calendars without major interruption, which we were able to do successfully.

(2010-2014)

Inventory Control Bradford Greenhouses LTD, Barrie, ON

  • Coordinate communication between store departments, shipping/receiving, and back office.
  • Purchase product for retail store.
  • Data entry of purchase orders and consolidating of invoices to product received.
  • Lead annual inventory counts.
Accomplishments

This Inventory Control position part of my dual role alongside IT Support. My signicant accomplishments from this position include creating documentation aligning with the policies and procedures developed in cooperation with the owners and human resources for the purpose of training and consistency across all departments. Although I left that position when I moved to Toronto I am still with the company and see the work I did years ago still in use today and it makes me proud.

(2010-2014)

Customer Service - Retail Bradford Greenhouses LTD, Barrie, ON

  • Face-to-face customer service in the nursery department of a garden centre.

(2006-2010)

Skills

Has developed a strong ability to work under pressure and at a fast pace due to the seasonal nature of previous experience; Clear and concise verbal and written communication; Programming experience in Ruby, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (and still learning!) as well as web hosting and database experience.
